```{r}
set.seed(42)
trees <- TreeSim::sim.bd.age(
  age = 10, numbsim = 2, lambda = 0.2, mu = 0.0,
  complete = FALSE
)
ape::plot.phylo(trees[[1]])


gammas <- rep(NA, length(trees))

for (i in seq_along(trees)) {
  gammas[i] <- ape::gammaStat(trees[[i]])
}

gammas
```
